page.title: 17The Registrar(cont)
page.content:
Such has become the popularity of{ {Gretna }that weddings are performed on only {4 }days to leave {Tuesday}and { {Thursday}free for administration.In a day the registrar can marry up to 14 couples.Each ceremony takes only 10 minutes to perform.
Contrary to general belief an application must be made to the registrar before getting married in { {Gretna},and couples cannot just turn up and expect to be married.The ages of those who have come to Gretna to tie the knot range from {16 to 80.} Pat enjoys her job very much indeed,and hopes to continue until she retires.
